document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding north), Ethiopia ; introduced to North America, South Africa , Australia and New Zealand ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
102 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , ZMUM , NSPU , IMC , SKC ) from 10 provinces were studied.
Crimea
:
1 spec. ( SKC ) Koktebel near Feodosia , Konovalenko leg.,
11.vi.2013
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol Distr. , Skelyaste (= Tav-Bodrak ), Pavlovskyj leg.,
16.vi.1911
;
1 spec. ( ZIN )) Bakhchisaray Distr. , Mangup , L. Arnoldi ,
6.vii.1937
;
1spec. ( ZIN ) Kirovske Distr. , Staryi Krym , Agarmish Mt. ,
23.vi.1906
;

;

12.v.1902

vi.1910

10.v.1904

;
